<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Move data from 'Import set table' column to 'Import set tables' column in Integration service table.
Move data from 'Set' column to 'Sets' column in Integration service table.</description>
        <name>Move data between table columns</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[migrateData("sn_hr_integr_fw_service", "import_set_table", "import_set_tables");
migrateData("sn_hr_integr_fw_service_job_tracker", "set", "sets");

function migrateData(tableName, oldField, newField) {
    var record = new GlideRecord(tableName);
    if (record.isValidField(oldField)) {
        record.addEncodedQuery(oldField + 'ISNOTEMPTY^' + newField + 'ISEMPTY');
        record.query();
        while (record.next()) {
            record.setValue(newField, record.getValue(oldField));
            record.update();
        }
    }
}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2021-02-22 04:39:09</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>101a4d20c722201013aa0b7c95c260f4</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>9</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Move data between table columns</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="">08ca765153ed5010a86dddeeff7b1277</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="">08ca765153ed5010a86dddeeff7b1277</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_101a4d20c722201013aa0b7c95c260f4</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2021-02-22 08:48:16</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
